name: Impel Down Key
description: Unlocks the fearsome Impel Down dungeon, full of enemies and rewards.

name: Skypiea Gate Key
description: Opens the gates to the sacred temple in the clouds. Sky beasts await.

name: Thriller Bark Key
description: Unlocks Gecko Moria's haunted domain filled with shadows and loot.

name: Fishman Ruins Key
description: Opens the ancient ruins beneath the sea. Beware of sea kings.
